parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.40

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Multiplayer

</value></part><part><name>serverExec</name>=<value> server
</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the [[Multiplayer_Scripting#Machine_network_ID | machine network ID]] of the client to which the group is local. This command only works when called from the server. When called from a client, it always returns 0.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''groupOwner''' group

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> group: [[Group]] -

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_clientID = [[groupOwner]] _someGroup;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[owner]], [[setOwner]], [[setGroupOwner]], [[local]], [[group]], [[didJIPOwner]], [[remoteExecutedOwner]]
</value></part></template></root>
